Complete Solutions

Watch Product Video

The Sixty-5 GM65 guidance and mapping package is the simplest most affordable precision agriculture package on the market today. The intuitive screen is a one button operation meaning when in the field press one button and the user drives as they normally would with the intuitive 3D screen recording the path and showing where to drive next in order to maximise the full implement width. The system is accurate to +/-15cm receiving both Glonass and GPS satellite signals for added reliability. It is simple to set up and can be moved from machine to machine simply and easily with only a 12v or 24v power supply needed. The GM65 package records treatments and automatically syncs this with the online portal (65Capture) when the tablet connects to a wifi connection. These treatment maps are automatically date and time stamped and can be used for accurate record keeping and compliance reporting. This data capture is achieved without the user having to do anything but complete the task in the field.

Enquire About This Product

The Sixty-5 GM65 guidance and mapping package is the simplest most affordable precision agriculture package on the market today. The intuitive screen is a one button operation meaning when in the field press one button and the user drives as they normally would with the intuitive 3D screen recording the path and showing where to drive next in order to maximise the full implement width. The system is accurate to +/-15cm receiving both Glonass and GPS satellite signals for added reliability. It is simple to set up and can be moved from machine to machine simply and easily with only a 12v or 24v power supply needed. The GM65 package records treatments and automatically syncs this with the online portal (65Capture) when the tablet connects to a wifi connection. These treatment maps are automatically date and time stamped and can be used for accurate record keeping and compliance reporting. This data capture is achieved without the user having to do anything but complete the task in the field.

Enquire About This Product

The IGM65 integrated guidance and mapping package is the idea choice for agricultural contractors, it combines all the benefits of the GM65 with the added advantage of being able to integrate into agricultural machinery automatically turning the area mapping on and off and accurately recording area worked. The IGM65 does this through the MDG65 which enables up to four inputs from the machine sending information to the system about what section of the implement is in work at any one time, while at the same time giving feedback to the operator for optimum driving. All maps generated are stored locally on the tablet and synced to the user online portal (65 Capture) when the tablet connects to wifi. This enables the modern contractor or farmer to concentrate on the task in hand as efficiently as possible while recording treatments for accurate billing or management purposes.

Enquire About This Product

The Sixty-5 IGMU65 goes one step further than the GMU65 in that it enables not only integration to the machinery via the MDG65 but also allows connection to any manufactured agricultural GPS unit that is able to output NMEA 0183. The advantage to this option is that now anyone that has previously invested in GPS in the past can simply and upgrade to the Sixty-5 platform and run an machine integrated guidance and mapping package with access to treatment data via their online portal 65Capture.

Enquire About This Product

MDG65

The Sixty-5 MDG65 mini data gateway comes complete with the IGM65 and IGMU65 and can also be available as an add-on to the GM65 and GMU65 to enhanced functionality.

The MDG65 is the first step in integrating the Sixty-5 suite of products with agricultural machinery for a more user friendly and advanced featured solution.

Enquire About This Product
